subject: Good Day,
body:
Good Day,
I'd like to know if you have any initiatives that need financing. We are willing to sponsor such ideas or enterprises. Please provide your email address for further information.
Best Weshes
Support team

subject: Re: Good Day,
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out. I'm interested to learn more about the financing opportunities you mentioned. Could you please provide me with some details on the types of ideas or projects that your organization is willing to sponsor? Additionally, could you share any specific criteria or requirements that need to be met in order to qualify for this financing?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Shalanda

subject: Re: Good Day,
body:
Greetings Shalanda,
Thanks for your prompt reply and interest in using our services. My name 
is Mr. Louis Ramgoolam from the United Kingdom, London UK, an investment 
Portfolio manager from Global angel investments for Asian countries, Sub 
African Regions and Saudi Arabia. We represent the interests of very 
wealthy top-end individuals but very private investors.

Please give us an exclusive business summary plan of your 
project/business (OR) simply let me know the type of business/projects 
you need these funds for and how much you think it will cost to enable 
us to secure a perfect investor for your project.

Note that our investors whom we manage their portfolios are capable of 
financing any type of project/ business as far as its profitable and 
legal.

See below investor’s interests.

INVESTORS INTEREST AREAS:-
My principal is interested in any profitable investment venture e.g. oil 
and gas, Technology, Agriculture, Mining in minerals, hospitality 
business, Real Estate, Renewable Energy, Industrial Production or in the 
Health Care Sector of Pharmaceuticals and Devices as well as for other 
business ventures. My investor is not a shrewd business man, only a 
pragmatist, who likes to deal in fact and figures without sugar-coating 
so he is open to any kind of other profitable business ideas. My client 
portfolio carries deal size from $USD1 Million to $USD 20Billion ++, 
earmarked for investment after risk analysis and the tenure of the 
investment is 10 years and can be renewed.

RETURNS:-
If agreed, the investment will be managed by you and the investor will 
be getting returns of 3-4% profit after tax and expenses which may be 
negotiable.

PLANS PRESENTATION, PERUSAL & APPROVAL:-
Please provide us with your summary of your investment plan which could 
be a one page document and also your personal profile. After this is 
received, I will study it and present it to the investor for final 
approval, an approval is a precursor for a meeting.

MEETING, AGREEMENTS & FINANCIAL DISCLOSURE:-
A meeting shall be scheduled for both parties to meet physically and 
discuss all modalities in person;

The sole objective of this meeting shall be as follows:
• To endorse a Memorandum of Understanding (MOU).
• Sign a Profit Sharing Agreement.
• Thirdly and most importantly sign all documents relating to the 
disbursement of funds at which point asset/funds shall be made known and 
transferred to you respectively.

Please note that my principal, the investor, insists on the need for a 
physical meeting between both parties. But in case there is a condition 
that will make it impossible for you to travel, it is not something that 
you should worry about. Just let me know and we can find a solution for 
that. If the above basic criteria are met and our offer is suitable to 
your project/business venture requirements, kindly present to me with 
your business summary/project and how much will be needed,

As i mentioned above: please note my investor is not a shrewd business 
man, only a pragmatist, who likes to deal in fact and figures without 
sugar coating so he is open to any kind of other profitable business 
ideas. If the above basic criteria are met and our offer is suitable to 
your funding requirements, Please get back to me at your earliest 
convenience so I can proceed to the next stage.
Regards,
Mr. Louis Ramgoolam
Global Angel Investors
www.globangelsinvestment.com

subject: Re: Good Day,
body:
Hello Mr. Louis Ramgoolam,

Thank you for reaching out to me and providing all the information about your services. I appreciate your interest in my project business. Before I proceed, I would like to know more about the process and how it works.

1. How do you secure perfect investors for projects? What is your approach in finding suitable investors?

2. Could you please provide some examples of successful projects that you have helped finance in the past? It would be great to see some real-life case studies.

3. What are the terms and conditions for managing the investment? Are there any specific requirements or expectations from the investor's side?

4. Can you explain more about the risk analysis process? How do you assess the potential risks associated with a project before investing?

5. Is there any specific timeline for the investment? How long does it usually take from initial approval to receiving funds?

I look forward to hearing back from you with more details. Thank you.

Best wishes,
Shalanda

subject: Re: Good Day,
body:
Greetings Shalanda,
I write to acknowledge the receipt of your email, with regard to your 
questions, please find answers below:-

1. How do you secure perfect investors for projects? What is your 
approach in finding suitable investors? Answer:- we do that by you 
providing us with your exclusive business plan and exactly how much you 
will be seeking for. The rest we do through our business network to 
secure a perfect investor that will finance your project.

2. Could you please provide some examples of successful projects that 
you have helped finance in the past? It would be great to see some 
real-life case studies. Answer:- we have done a lot from Africa to 
Europe to Asia but unfortunately, we are not allowed to share our 
client’s information to any third party.

3. What are the terms and conditions for managing the investment? Are 
there any specific requirements or expectations from the investor's 
side? Answer:- first of all, a face to face meeting will be required 
before the money can be released, which you as the borrower will have to 
book your flight ticket and pay for your accommodation for the face to 
face meeting when the time arrives. our loan period time goes up to 20 
years with 2 years grace period for repayment. Further terms and 
condition will be on the contract agreement.

4. Can you explain more about the risk analysis process? How do you 
assess the potential risks associated with a project before investing? 
Answer:- we will be coming for site inspection regularly if your loan is 
approved to make sure that the money is used accordingly and also to 
avoid to avoid any mismanagement of funds.

5. Is there any specific timeline for the investment? How long does it 
usually take from initial approval to receiving funds? Answer:- we are 
private agent, we facilitate faster, it can be done within a week or two 
depending on the project.

I hope this answers your questions as I look forward to receiving your 
business plan if you have any.
Regards,
Mr. Louis Ramgoolam
Global Angel Investors
www.globangelsinvestment.com

subject: Re: Good Day,
body:
Hello Mr. Louis Ramgoolam,

Thank you for your response and for providing answers to my questions. I appreciate your willingness to share information.

Regarding securing perfect investors for projects, it seems that you rely on the business plan provided by the client. Could you please explain how you evaluate the suitability of a business plan? What factors do you consider?

I understand that you are not able to share specific examples of successful projects due to confidentiality reasons. However, could you provide some general information about the types of industries or sectors in which you have helped finance projects? It would be helpful to get an idea of your expertise.

In terms of managing the funds, I noticed that a face-to-face meeting is required before the money can be released. Is this meeting held at your office or at a different location? Additionally, are there any fees associated with this meeting?

Regarding the risk analysis process, could you elaborate on how you assess potential risks associated with a project? What measures do you take to ensure that the funds are used appropriately and efficiently?

Lastly, I'm curious about the timeline from initial approval to receiving funds. You mentioned that it can be done within a week or two depending on the project. Are there any factors that may cause delays in this process?

Thank you once again for your time and assistance. I look forward to hearing back from you.

Best wishes,
Shalanda

subject: Re: Good Day,
body:
Greetings Shalanda,
I write to acknowledge the receipt of your email. With regard to your 
questions, to proceed I will exclusive business plan as I have told you 
before to avoid any much repetition of comments. Once this is achieved I 
will then forward it to all our investors to see who will be interested 
to finance the project. The face to face meeting will be done where the 
investor will invite you, not in our office because we are not the one 
giving you the loan, we are only agents and facilitators. We don’t ask  
for any upfront payment, the only financial input from your side is for 
you to purchase your flight ticket and book your accommodation for the 
face to face meeting when the time arrives. I hope this answers your 
questions and I will be waiting for your business plan if indeed you 
still need our service.
Regards,
Mr. Louis Ramgoolam
Global Angel Investors
www.globangelsinvestment.com

subject: Re: Good Day,
body:
Hello Mr. Louis Ramgoolam,

Thank you for your response. I appreciate the information you have provided so far. I understand that you are an agent and not directly providing the loan. Could you please explain a bit more about how this process works? How do you connect entrepreneurs with potential investors? And what kind of business plan would be required?

Also, regarding the face-to-face meeting, how does that usually take place? Will it be in my country or will I need to travel to a different location? And if I need to purchase a flight ticket, how much would that typically cost?

I look forward to hearing back from you.

Best wishes,
Shalanda

subject: Re: Good Day,
body:
Greetings Shalanda,
I write to acknowledge the receipt of your email. Dear madam, I am 
really sorry due to my busy schedule I won’t be having too much time to 
be entertaining your email as you keep repeating the same question every 
time. I have detailed you everything you need to know about this 
process. If indeed you still need our service, read my previous email 
and follow a common instruction. If not, I will suggest you look for 
other investors in your region to assist you and also to avoid any 
repetition of comments and unnecessary delays.

subject: Re: Good Day,
body:
Hello Shalanda,

I hope this email finds you well. I apologize for any confusion caused by my previous emails. I understand that you may have some questions or concerns, and I'm here to help clarify any information you need.

Could you please let me know specifically which part of the process you would like more details on? I want to make sure I address your inquiries accurately and provide you with the necessary information.

Additionally, if there are any specific terms or conditions that you would like further clarification on, please don't hesitate to ask. It's important to me that you feel fully informed and comfortable moving forward.

Thank you for considering our service. We value your interest and look forward to assisting you in any way we can.

Best wishes,
Shalanda

subject: Re: Good Day,
body:
Greetings Shalanda,
Thank you once again for your quick response. Once again, do you have a 
project or business that needs funding? If yes please give us an 
exclusive business summary plan of your project/business (OR) simply let 
me know the type of business/projects you need these funds for and how 
much you think it will cost to enable us to secure a perfect investor 
for your project.
Regards,
Mr. Louis Ramgoolam
Global Angel Investors
www.globangelsinvestment.com

subject: Re: Good Day,
body:
Hello Mr. Louis Ramgoolam,

Thank you for reaching out to me again. I appreciate your interest in funding projects or businesses. While I don't currently have a specific project in mind, I am curious about the types of projects that your investors are interested in.

Could you please provide more information about the industries or sectors that your investors typically focus on? Additionally, what is the range of investment amounts that they usually consider?

I look forward to learning more about the opportunities you have available.

Best wishes,
Shalanda

subject: Re: Good Day,
body:
Greetings Shalanda,
I hope this mail finds you in a good health? Dear Shalanda, with all due 
respect, do you have reading or understanding problem. Which part of my 
explanations that I have been giving you from day that you don’t 
understand? Do you mind to go back to our previous emails where I 
mentioned about the type of project that our investors are interested in 
funding? I even went further by explaining to you that our investors can 
invest in any project as far as it is legal and profitable. Please let’s 
avoid all this repetition of comments. If you have a project that need 
finding, let me know. If you don’t then let’s stop wasting each other’s 
time until you have one.  Thank you.

subject: Re: Good Day,
body:
Hello,

I hope you are doing well. I appreciate your message. Could you please provide more details about the type of projects your investors are interested in funding? I would like to learn more about the opportunities available. Thank you for reaching out.

Best wishes,
Shalanda

subject: Re: Good Day,
body:
Greetings Shalanda,
I hope this mail finds you in good health? Please with all due respect, 
I am very busy to be entertaining such games that you are playing. If 
you cannot read or understand English, why don’t you ask someone to 
assist you? Once again for the last time, go back to our previous 
conversation, read my 1st and 2nd email I sent to you carefully. You 
will find all the answers to your questions, including the ones you 
might ask tomorrow. Also it will help you to stop asking the same 
questions over and over again. Thank you.

subject: Re: Good Day,
body:
Hello,

I appreciate your message. I understand you're busy, but I'm here to help. Could you please provide more details about the previous email you mentioned? I want to make sure I have all the information needed to assist you effectively. Thank you.

Best wishes,
Shalanda

subject: Re: Fwd: Re: Good Day,
body:
Hello! How can I help you today?

Best wishes,
Shalanda
